0.0.2.name: wordpress/schnaeppchen-widget
0.0.2.description: This Plugin provides a widget that allows the user to display actual bargains (Schnäppchen) in the sidebar. You can choose the number of articles to show and where you get them from (reichweite.de or schnaeppchenforum.com).
